Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT T1.SITUACAOT2.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
FROM SEGUROS.V0MESTSINI
 
where t2.cod_agencia        =  :COD_AGENCIA
  and t2.num_contrato       =  :NUM_CONTRATO
  and t2.dv_contrato        =  :DV_CONTRATO
  and t1.num_apol_sinistro  =  t2.num_apol_sinistro
  and t1.situacao          <>  '2'
/
 END SQL
